assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Zeon Corporation engages in the elastomers, specialty materials, and other businesses. The company offers synthetic rubbers, latices, aroma, and specialty chemicals. It also offers electronic materials comprising of photoresists, electron beam resist, etching agent, and coating insulation materials, as well as lithium-ion rechargeable battery materials. In addition, the company provides specialty plastics, such as cyclo olefin polymer and prototype production service products. Further, the company offers specialty plastics, plastic film, carbon nanotube related products. Additionally, the company develops, manufactures, and sells cardiovascular and gastrointestinal medical equipment, as well as nutritional products. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
